stimulusHtml:
Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.

Discuss the relationship between politics and religion by examining the wars of religion.

Choose TWO specific examples from the following:

  • Dutch Revolt

  • French Wars of Religion

  • English Civil War

  • Thirty Years' War

Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.
